title: Model
text:
Call:
lm(formula = distance_to_fire_m ~ speed_2d + altitude + direction, 
    data = train_data)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-2.1492 -0.3501  0.1961  0.6467  1.4930 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)   
(Intercept)  0.24362    0.21898   1.112  0.27476   
speed_2d     0.15886    0.13567   1.171  0.25084   
altitude    -0.28382    0.10136  -2.800  0.00885 **
direction   -0.02089    0.14389  -0.145  0.88552   
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 0.9976 on 30 degrees of freedom
  (43001 observations deleted due to missingness)
Multiple R-squared:  0.2339,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.1573 
F-statistic: 3.053 on 3 and 30 DF,  p-value: 0.04357



Call:
glm(formula = fire_nearby ~ speed_2d + altitude + direction, 
    family = binomial, data = train_data)

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
(Intercept) -7.33018    0.18821 -38.946  < 2e-16 ***
speed_2d     0.38341    0.06238   6.146 7.94e-10 ***
altitude     0.10523    0.03041   3.460 0.000539 ***
direction   -0.03339    0.17722  -0.188 0.850554    
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1)

    Null deviance: 553.72  on 43034  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 523.46  on 43031  degrees of freedom
AIC: 531.46

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 10
